content:
ModelErrorMessage Class

In this Article

Displays the first model error for a given key from the page's model state.

Syntax

Declaration

[System.ComponentModel.DefaultProperty("Key")]
[System.Web.UI.ParseChildren(true)]
[System.Web.UI.PersistChildren(false)]
[System.Web.UI.ToolboxData("<{0}:ModelErrorMessage runat="server" Key="ModelStateKey"></{0}:ModelErrorMessage>")]
public class ModelErrorMessage : System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • Control
  • WebControl
  • System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label
  • ModelErrorMessage

Constructors summary

ModelErrorMessage()

Initializes a new instance of the ModelErrorMessage class.

Properties summary

AssociatedControlID

Gets or sets the ID of the control that is associated with the error message.
ModelStateKey

Gets or sets the key for which the first error from the page's model state is to be displayed.
SetFocusOnError

Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the focus should be set on the associated control when an error is displayed.
Text

Gets or sets the text of the error message.

Methods summary

OnPreRender(EventArgs)

Raises the PreRender event of the base class and specifies additional processing.

Constructors

  • ModelErrorMessage()

    Initializes a new instance of the ModelErrorMessage class.

    public ModelErrorMessage ();

Properties

  • AssociatedControlID

    Gets or sets the ID of the control that is associated with the error message.

    public override string AssociatedControlID { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The ID of the control.

  • ModelStateKey

    Gets or sets the key for which the first error from the page's model state is to be displayed.

    public string ModelStateKey { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The key.

  • SetFocusOnError

    Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the focus should be set on the associated control when an error is displayed.

    public bool SetFocusOnError { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the focus should be set; otherwise, false.

  • Text

    Gets or sets the text of the error message.

    public override string Text { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The error message text.

    Remarks

    This property is not visible in the designer because it is set automatically from model state. The property value is not stored in view state because it is re-evaluated every time the page is rendered.

Methods

  • OnPreRender(EventArgs)

    Raises the PreRender event of the base class and specifies additional processing.

    protected override void OnPreRender (EventArgs e);

    Parameters

    • e
      EventArgs

      The event arguments.

    Remarks

    If there is an error, this method HTML-encodes the error message, and it sets the focus to the associated control if the SetFocusOnError property is true.
